WorkItem.Description:
Shows the error 


Exception Details: System.InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains no elements
 in the line "Album album = storeDB.Albums.Single(a => a.AlbumId == id);" 
How do i rectify that?
WorkItem.Summary: The edit action in the StoreManagerController

Comments.Message:
Can you give some context about where you are in the tutorial?

That error means that it didn't find an album with the ID that was provided in the URL.
